scripts.buildScript: echo 'startingScript' && npm run script1 && npm run script2 && echo 'Done!'
scripts.script1: node set-build-dir.cjs && echo 'stage1' && npm run buildBranch && echo 'stage2' && npm run addpush && echo 'stage3' && npm run deploymain && echo 'stage4'
scripts.script2: npm run gitpush && echo 'stage5'  && npm run backtoCurrent && echo 'stage6'
scripts.addpush: git add . &&  git commit -m "update week1-vite" && git push origin week1-vite
scripts.deploymain: git checkout main && git pull origin main && git merge week1-vite && git add . && git commit -m "Merge week1-vite into main"
